select fb.feedback_id, ap.app_name, fb.package_name, fb.version_code, fb.content, fb.qq, fb.vx, IFNULL(fb.tel,u.phone) tel, fb.feedback_option_content1, fb.feedback_option_content2, fb.uuid, fb.mac, fb.brand_name, fb.model_name, fb.process_status, fb.remark, DATE_FORMAT(fb.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_feedback fb LEFT JOIN t_user u on u.user_id=fb.create_user LEFT JOIN t_app ap on ap.package_name=fb.package_name where 1=1 and fb.`status`=true
and ap.channel_id=#{channelId}
and DATE_FORMAT(fb.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(fb.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and fb.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
and fb.process_status=#{processStatus}
order by fb.create_time desc
